AUTOSTART.HUAWEI: On Huawei devices, please allow manual app start: Settings ‚Üí Battery ‚Üí App launch ‚Üí Manage manually ‚Üí Enable Auto‚Äëstart + Run in background

ONBOARDING.WELCOME_TEXT: MyMoodLog is a mood diary designed for
ONBOARDING.WELCOME_LIST_ITEM_1: the personal assessment and documentation of emotional and physical states (e.g. mood, tension, pain)
ONBOARDING.WELCOME_LIST_ITEM_2: as well as creating individual crisis or help plans.
ONBOARDING.NUMBERED_LIST_HEADING: To get started using the app:
ONBOARDING.NUMBERED_LIST_ITEM_1: Define emotional and physical states you want to assess regularly on a scale from 0‚Äì10 ‚Üí My mood tracking parameters
ONBOARDING.NUMBERED_LIST_ITEM_2: Set up if and when you want to be reminded to assess your mood ‚Üí My reminders
ONBOARDING.NUMBERED_LIST_ITEM_3: Create individual help/crisis plans ‚Üí My crisis plans
ONBOARDING.NUMBERED_LIST_ITEM_4: Assign the help/crisis plans to your tracking parameters ‚Üí My mood tracking parameters
ONBOARDING.DISCLAIMER_CONTENT: The MyMoodLog app provides support for self-reflection and self-help. It does not constitute medical, psychological, or psychotherapeutic advice, and cannot replace professional treatment. In case of acute psychological distress or crisis, please contact qualified professionals or appropriate support services.
ONBOARDING.COPYRIGHT_CONTENT: MyMoodLog is designed to protect your personal data. You can use the app permanently without registration or providing personal details. All entered data is stored and processed only locally within the app.
ONBOARDING.OPEN_SOURCE_CONTENT_1: This project is open source. The source code is available on
ONBOARDING.EXPORT_IMPORT_CONTENT: Back up or restore your app data ‚Äî useful when changing devices or for creating secure backups.

CRISIS_PLAN_INFO.TITLE: Crisis Plans
CRISIS_PLAN_INFO.TEXT:
You can use the app to create individual crisis or help plans. These are designed to support you in difficult times to take appropriate actions or seek help. Plans should be created in a calm state and based on personal experiences.

You can create multiple plans for different situations (e.g. one plan for mild tension and another for high tension). Use descriptive names to make them easier to identify.

Later, in the 'My Mood Tracking Parameters' section, you can assign the crisis plans to specific scale levels (e.g. Tension 5 ‚Üí Plan for mild tension, Tension 7 ‚Üí Plan for strong tension). When you reach that scale level during your mood check, the corresponding plan will appear automatically.

MOOD_LOG_INFO.TITLE: Mood Diary
MOOD_LOG_INFO.TEXT: Define emotional and physical states you want to regularly assess on a 0‚Äì10 scale. You can use the default options provided by the app or define your own (e.g. pain, tension, distress, fear, nausea).

NOTIFICATION_INFO.TITLE: Reminders
NOTIFICATION_INFO.TEXT:
The app can remind you daily to assess your current mood state. You can choose up to five times per day when you‚Äôd like to be reminded.

Make sure that notifications are allowed for this app on your smartphone.

You can also record your mood at any time manually ‚Üí New Mood Log Entry

MOOD_LOG_HISTORY_INFO.TITLE: Mood History
MOOD_LOG_HISTORY_INFO.TEXT: The app records your inputs so you can review the history of your feelings and moods over time.

HELP_CRISIS_SITUATIONS.TITLE: üÜò Help in crises
HELP_CRISIS_SITUATIONS.INTRO: MyMoodLog supports reflection and self-help, but is not a substitute for professional counseling. If you are in an acute mental health crisis, please contact qualified professionals or the following free and confidential helplines in Austria:
HELP_CRISIS_SITUATIONS.OUTRO: These services are available for you ‚Äî anytime, anonymously, and free of charge.

TELEFONSEELSORGE.NAME: Telephone helpline ‚Äì 142
TELEFONSEELSORGE.DESC: Available 24/7, anonymous and free of charge

MAENNERNOTRUF.NAME: Men‚Äôs helpline Austria ‚Äì 0800 246 247
MAENNERNOTRUF.DESC: Support for men in crisis or violent situations, available 24/7

EXPORT_HISTORY.NO_ENTRIES_FOUND: No entries found for the selected time range.
EXPORT_HISTORY.EXPORT_SUCCESS: Your mood history was exported successfully.

EXPORT_IMPORT.EXPORT_DESC: Create a backup of your app data in a JSON file. You can later import this file back into the app.
EXPORT_IMPORT.IMPORT_DESC: Select a previously saved JSON backup file to import data into the app. Existing data and settings will be overwritten.
EXPORT_IMPORT.ERASE_WARNING: Importing will erase all current app data. Do you really want to continue? You can continue in {{seconds}} seconds.
EXPORT_IMPORT.ERASE_WARNING_READY: You can now continue ‚Äî all current data will be erased.
